headline: Broadcom Strengthens Strategic Partnership with NEC to Drive Modern Private Cloud with VMware Cloud Foundation
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., Nov. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ: AVGO) today announced plans to expand its strategic partnership with NEC Corporation (TSE: 6701) to adopt a modern private cloud utilizing VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF). Leveraging the skills and expertise gained from implementing VCF in its own IT systems, NEC will promote the modernization of private clouds, enabling customers to ensure security and accelerate innovation. headline: Broadcom (AVGO): A Fresh Look at Valuation After Sustained Share Price Growth
summary: Broadcom (AVGO) shares have been in focus recently, in part due to ongoing investor attention on its sustained growth in both revenue and net income over the past year. As the company continues to expand, many are evaluating how its latest results compare with broader semiconductor trends. See our latest analysis for Broadcom. This year, Broadcom’s share price momentum has stayed strong as investors continue to factor in growth across its core business, with the shares up an impressive 47.71%...

headline: What Broadcom (AVGO)’s VMware Cloud Foundation Upgrades Mean for Cloud and AI Strategy
summary: Earlier this month, Broadcom announced new advances for VMware Cloud Foundation, introducing an open ecosystem designed to streamline private cloud deployment and bolster AI infrastructure, including certified VCF AI ReadyNodes and unified network fabrics based on open standards. This initiative aims to increase flexibility for customers adopting next-generation hardware while enhancing interoperability and simplifying networking for modern cloud environments. We'll examine how Broadcom's...
